metadata.Title: CVE-2009-0165 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
Integer overflow in the JBIG2 decoder in Xpdf 3.02pl2 and earlier, as usedin Poppler and other products, when running on Mac OS X, has unspecifiedimpact, related to "g*allocn."

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2009-0165` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

xpdf - 3.02-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: xpdf package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.02-2').
libextractor: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
